name: Believe (itch)
description:
The devil has waged war on the mortal realm and god will not help because he is disgusted with how humanity has become.
Mother earth has not yet given up on humans and intrusts one with the power of the elements. It is your mission to wipe out the monsters that have plagued the earth.

KEY FEATURE(s)

Your four abillities are based on the four elements - fire,water,earth,air each of which you will need to used to overcome the devilish spawns.

RELEASE DATE: 26 June 2015

PLATFORM: PC

PRICE: FREE
